job.title: Software Engineer (C#, Azure, Chatbot)
job.description: Title: Software Engineer (C#, Azure, Chatbot)As the Sr. Software Engineer for a nationally recognized healthcare technology company based in Dallas, you will develop and support conversational AI, Voice, and Text applications.The ideal candidate will have experience with natural language conversation concerning Conversational AI (chatbots, Google/Alexa) and enjoy working in a fast-paced, technically astute team.Direct Hire position. Local candidates preferred. Unable to sponsor.Required Skills and ExperienceKnowledge in/with conversational AI (chatbots, Google/Alexa voice skills)Experience with at least two of the following interfaces (text/SMS, âchat bubbleâ text, IVR-like interaction on a phone or voice device, e.g., Google Hub/Alexa).Â C#, .NET Core experience in an Azure environment.Strong experience with Azure KubernetesDemonstrated experience with Agile methodology.Two + years of experience with relational databases. NoSQL is preferred.Experience with Angular or React, design patterns, event-driven systems, message-driven systems.Nice to HaveKnowledge of Node.js and TypescriptFamiliar with designs and applications using No-SQL technologiesExperience in microservice developmentPrior healthcare experience ResponsibilitiesWork with multiple product development teams to support APIs supporting âchat AIâ integration across products.Act as active Agile team member, assisting in the success of the Scrum teamEvolve existing product offerings while also designing enterprise-grade green-field systems.BENEFITS of working for our Client:Great Far North Dallas LocationExcellent Medical and 401K with matchingGenerous PTOWork from home options
